markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Abundant Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=482)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 401 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 15 feet or more

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.
name: Abundant Step
